TopicTitle: Where to download 1.4.3 if bought from KSP store?

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I'm trying to find 1.4.3 as many of my mods aren't compatible with 1.4.4 yet.  I bought the game through the KSP website/store, but they don't offer the prior minor versions for download.  Just the major versions (1.4.4, 1.3.1).

Where can I get 1.4.3?

Thank you!

4 minutes ago, tsaven said:

Hey guys, I'm trying to find 1.4.3 as many of my mods aren't compatible with 1.4.4 yet.  I bought the game through the KSP website/store, but they don't offer the prior minor versions for download.  Just the major versions (1.4.4, 1.3.1).

Where can I get 1.4.3?

Thank you!

You basically can't. Depending on the mod, you may be able to just use it in 1.4.4 (ignore the warnings) or find versions for 1.3.1. Unless you're using Making History, there aren't that many real differences between 1.4.x and 1.3.x

And to keep this from happening in the future, keep your install files after you download them. In fact, just in case you should check your download folder maybe it's still there.

10 minutes ago, 5thHorseman said:

You basically can't. Depending on the mod, you may be able to just use it in 1.4.4 (ignore the warnings) or find versions for 1.3.1. Unless you're using Making History, there aren't that many real differences between 1.4.x and 1.3.x

And to keep this from happening in the future, keep your install files after you download them. In fact, just in case you should check your download folder maybe it's still there.

That's disappointing.  Kopernicus is unfortunately very broken in 1.4.4 and the author has said he won't be updating until after 1.4.5.

14 minutes ago, tsaven said:

That's disappointing.  Kopernicus is unfortunately very broken in 1.4.4 and the author has said he won't be updating until after 1.4.5.

I know It's the only reason I myself haven't upgraded.

I strongly suggest you just use 1.3.1. Most mods keep older versions in obvious places. Here's Kopernicus.
